import "./comicsList.scss"; import uw from "../../resources/img/UW.png"; import xMen from "../../resources/img/x-men.png"; import useMarvelService from "../../services/MarvelService"; import { useEffect } from "react"; const ComicsList = () => { const { getAllComics } = useMarvelService(); useEffect(() => { onRequest(); // eslint-disable-next-line }, []); const onRequest = () => { getAllComics().then((res) => console.log(res.res.data)); }; return (
